Running on version `r params$version` 

```{r, echo = F}
   library(knitr)
   source("utils.R")
   data <- getFilterTablesDS(params$inputfolder)
```


## Filter set up

```{r, echo = F}
if ( !is.null(data$setup)) {
   kable(data$setup)
} else {
   print("Data analyzed do not correspond to the same set up conditions")
}
```

## Statistics summary 

```{r, echo = F}
   kable(data$table, digits = 3)
```
